snippet: Wiz Khalifa was arrested in the Los Angeles International Airport during a confrontation involving a hoverboard.
abstract: Wiz Khalifa was arrested in the Los Angeles International Airport during a confrontation involving a hoverboard.

headline.main: Wiz Khalifa Arrested for Refusing to Get Off Hoverboard
